articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Belarus forces airliner to land and arrests opponent, sparking US and European outrage - CNA
articles.description: MOSCOW: Belarusian authorities scrambled a fighter jet and flagged what turned out to be a false bomb alert to force a Ryanair plane to land on Sunday (May 23) and then detained an opposition-minded journalist who was on board, drawing condemnation from Europ…

articles.author: Rahul Singh
articles.title: Indian peacekeepers help civilians evacuate after volcano erupts in Congo - Hindustan Times
articles.description: There are more than 2,300 Indian troops with the UN’s costliest peacekeeping mission in the Congo, a sprawling (the size of western Europe), dangerous and notoriously unstable country formerly known as Zaire.
articles.content: The Indian Army played a crucial role in the evacuation of civilians and United Nations personnel from North Kivus capital Goma after a volcano erupted in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo on … [+2764 chars]
